item.title: Litter around bins on Law Street, 21st September
item.description:
There is food packaging and broken glass around the commercial waste bins belonging to Bad Moon Cafe on Law Street. The litter has been there over one week. It is a hygiene issue affecting local residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Law Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Request for Replacement of Missing Rubbish Bin, 21st September
item.description:

item.title: Dead dangerous overhanging branches, 21st September
item.description:
Live by cupola wood next to Pickhurst recreational ground. Trees very overgrown. Some trees have died and are hanging over my garden posing a threat to health and safety as well as equipment we use with our disabled son. Have had branches collapse already some have landed on property and others narrowly missing my son.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Way, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsing gully see comments above, 21st September
item.description:
This is a recurring problem that was recently ineffectively repaired.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously damaged bollard has been very shoddily repaired., 21st September
item.description:
I previously reported by telephone a bollard which had been knocked into outside 99 Clifton Hill NW8 0JR. To my astonishment, the bollard has been "repaired" in a very shoddy way with a lump of black tarmac being dumped around the base, rather than being properly repaired with a flat concrete base as one would expect! See photo. This street is lined with Listed buildings in a Conservation Area. Please re-repair this bollard properly using concrete like all the others. Do things properly please! Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 99, Clifton Hill, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rental bike dumped on the corner of Tabard Street, 21st September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 217, Tabard Street, The Borough, London
